base_description: Slim black wireless keyboard with USB receiver.
part_description: Contains 104 keys in a rectangular layout; USB receiver nearby.
internal_interaction_description: Keys are arranged in rows with standard spacing, allowing for tactile feedback when pressed. The wireless receiver connects to the keyboard electronically, enabling communication without physical wires.
external_interaction_description: The keyboard connects wirelessly to computers via the USB receiver, allowing users to input data. It requires a compatible device with a USB port and may need batteries or charging for power.
